head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAHARY, SHAUL S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAHARY, SHAUL S.

block.p: BAHARY-Shaul S. Age 97 of New York passed away September 25, 2000. Beloved husband of Victoria, devoted father of Kamel, Emil, Gladys & William. Loving brother of Norman, Khatoun, and Violet. Father-in-law of Kamal and Susan. Cherished grandfather of two and great-grandfather of two. Funeral services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue, Wednesday, September 27 at 11 AM.

BAHARY-Shaul S. Age 97 of New York passed away September 25, 2000. Beloved husband of Victoria, devoted father of Kamel, Emil, Gladys & William. Loving brother of Norman, Khatoun, and Violet. Father-in-law of Kamal and Susan. Cherished grandfather of two and great-grandfather of two. Funeral services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue, Wednesday, September 27 at 11 AM.
